title: S17 Ep20: Supernatural News/Parashare: That Ghost Just Gave Me the Finger Edition
itunes:title: Supernatural News/Parashare: That Ghost Just Gave Me the Finger Edition
description:
Darkness Radio presents: Supernatural News/Parashare: That Ghost Just Gave Me the Finger Edition!

What a long, strange week it has been!  A Pastor burns a bunch of Harry Potter and Twilight books to get rid of demonic influences, Meanwhile, Satancon goes off without any issues!  Ghost Hunters are called in to conduct a seance in a haunted pet shop, A ghostly woman in white is telling visitors to kindly f*** off, and Aliens are getting their "oil" all over everything!! 

Check out where Beer City Bruiser will be appearing in your area: https://twitter.com/bcbwinchester
